name: 10 Question Kids Quiz: Redwall Series | Jacques, Brian

questions.text: What is the name of Martin I's father?
questions.explanation:
Luke.

	Martin told Gonff all about it in 'Mossflower.'

questions.text: Who of the following died in the book 'Redwall'?
questions.explanation:
Abbot Mortimer.

	It was sad when he died...

questions.text: What is the name of the Abbey that Abbess Germaine came from?

options: Evil and very bad fox dude

questions.text: What is the name of Matthias' sword?
questions.explanation:
Ratdeath.

	Abbot Mortimer gave it this name as he was dying.

questions.text: What is the name of Gabool's Island?
How many Pearls of Lutra are there?
What is the name of the icky vermin foxes(Answer is also the title of the book)?
questions.explanation:
Marlfox.

	I REALLY don't like those guys...

questions.text: What is the name of Bella's father?
questions.explanation:
Boar(pick this one!).

	He was awesome.
